translation.SELECT LOGIN: Select the user to login as:
translation.DELETE ACCOUNT: Warning: When an account is deleted, the data is wiped from the server and there is no way to retrieve it
translation.ROLE TIP: This determines the privilege level of the student within the system
translation.ROLE TIP STUDENT: Normal user who has no administrative privilege
translation.ROLE TIP CLASS: Admin user who can add, read, update or delete students within the same class, generate registration key, or change the privilege of normal users
translation.ROLE TIP CURRICULUM: Admin user who can add, read, update or delete students within the same curriculum, generate registration key, or change the privilege of normal users or class admins
translation.ROLE TIP YEAR: Admin user who can add, read, update or delete students within the same year, generate registration key, or change the privilege of normal users or class/curriculum admins
translation.ROLE TIP SYSTEM: Admin user who can add, read, update or delete students within the same system, generate registration key, or change the privilege of normal users or class/curriculum/year admins

translation.The identifier or the password is incorr: 电话号码/邮箱或密码不正确
translation.name: 姓名
translation.Name: 姓名
translation.Only visible to the students graduating: 仅对同年毕业学生可见
translation.This setting determines the scope of use: 此项决定了个人信息将对哪些用户可见，但是不影响特定管理员的访问权限
translation.ROLE TIP: 此项决定了用户的权限等级
translation.ROLE TIP STUDENT: 普通用户，无管理员权限
translation.ROLE TIP CLASS: 可以添加，查看，更改，删除同班学生，生成注册码，改变普通用户的权限
translation.ROLE TIP CURRICULUM: 可以添加，查看，更改，删除同体系学生，生成注册码，改变普通用户或班级管理员的权限
translation.ROLE TIP YEAR: 可以添加，查看，更改，删除同届学生，生成注册码，改变普通用户或班级，年级管理员的权限
translation.ROLE TIP SYSTEM: 可以添加，查看，更改，删除任意学生，生成注册码，改变任意管理员的权限
translation.DELETE ACCOUNT: 警告：删除账号将会抹除服务器上存储的用户数据，这个操作是不可逆的
translation.Title: 标题
translation.registration: 无法注册/注册码相关问题
translation.This user is invalid, please login again: 此用户无效，请尝试重新登录
